net.grabsalot.business

Class CollectionTreeNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode
      • net.grabsalot.business.CollectionTreeNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, javax.swing.tree.MutableTreeNode, javax.swing.tree.TreeNode

    public class CollectionTreeNode
extends javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode
    The node element for the JTree that displays the collection contents. It holds a LocalElement field that has most of the data needed.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
